channel.title: For All You Client Editors
channel.description:
Alright, well, I know this probably isn't a big deal, I've kind of been self conscious about my projects, so here we go,
Recently, I was logging into RS to check out the new RS updates, and when I logged in, I noticed the snazzy new login box, so, I screenshotted it, photoshopped it to hell, and voila.
Now, Like I said, this may not be "huge" but, the key point is, this is the .PSD file for photoshop, and each button and text section is separated into its own layer and the backpanel has been filled in, so its nice and easy to edit(:
(And btw, the text sections have been cutout, not the cheap box-cuts. So you can put an image behind the text and it won't look boxy.)
Now for some pics::
[img]http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/3121/newloginboxrender1.png[/img] This is the entire PSD
[img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/6310/newloginboxrender3.png[/img] The login boxes hidden
[img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/188/newloginboxrender2.png[/img] The entire contents hidden (No boxes around the text ^^)
And now the piece de resistance:
EDIT: Uploaded PNG's As Well
DOWNLOAD (.PSD): http://www.multiupload.com/QH2BLCCEPB DOWNLOAD (PNG NORMAL LOGINBOX): http://www.multiupload.com/FT2JSZ9559 DOWNLOAD (PNG WITH DRAGON): http://www.multiupload.com/1OGJPYDRGZ DOWNLOAD (PNG WITH BULLETS): http://www.multiupload.com/38GP1B7AWZ
P.S.
If you want anything else done, or you want any specific RS images ripped, PM me, I enjoy doing this(:

item.title: For All You Client Editors
item.dc:creator: @Sideways_8 Sideways_8
item.description:
@Sideways_8 wrote:

It’s all good. It was kind of my fault, I posted in the wrong section (accident.) But I seriously doubt Krackk uses Photoshop that fluently if he couldn’t understand how I separated the layers for each item on the loginbox. He said it was a “simple glow effect” Which you can’t do on screenshotted text, so maybe if I see some of his work, I’ll take this back. But as far as I can tell, he doesn’t photoshop.

Read full topic

item.title: For All You Client Editors
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Sideways_8:

Oh really? Lmfao, download it, all the images have been cutout, see how the bullets show up behind the image? You try a simple glow effect and tell me what you get. Because these images I made from a screenshot of the real RS login. So how exactly do you put a glow on text thats in a flattened image? gf.

Oh, you wanna fight sexy?, its called layer properites/croping then layer merging…Again not “that” hard.

Read full topic
